{{book: '''''Arda 1986, Volume VI''''' is an issue of the publication ''[[Arda (annual)
column2: Arda]]''. The issue is noteworthy for including a manuscript facsimile of "[[The Clerkes Compleinte]]", a rare poem by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. Notes to the manuscript are provided by [[Christopher Tolkien]] and [[Anders Stenström]].

{{book: *The Clerkes Compleinte Revisited [with facsimile of Tolkien's manuscript] / Djäknens klagan än en gång
*Ian A. Muirhead: Theology in Gandalf's Garden / Teologi i Gandalfs trädgård
*[[Anders Stenström]]: Något om Ringbärarens dagar kring Spindelns Pass / Some Notes on the Ringbearer's Days around the Pass of the Spider
*[[Åke Bertenstam]]: Supplement för 1985-1986 till En Tolkienbibliografi / Supplement for 1985-1986 to A Tolkien Bibliography
